name: DV_DATE_TIME
title: DV_DATE_TIME
description: Represents an absolute point in time, specified to the second. Semantics defined by ISO 8601. Used for recording a precise point in real world time, and for approximate time stamps, e.g. the origin of a HISTORY in an OBSERVATION which is only partially known.

element.short: Represents an absolute point in time, specified to the second. Semantics defined by ISO 8601
element.definition: Represents an absolute point in time, specified to the second. Semantics defined by ISO 8601. Used for recording a precise point in real world time, and for approximate time stamps, e.g. the origin of a HISTORY in an OBSERVATION which is only partially known.
